CZ2002_Assignment.Menu

  • Uses of Menu in CZ2002_Assignment

    Methods in CZ2002_Assignment with parameters of type Menu
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Order.addAlacarteItems​(Menu m)
    Asks user to add new alacarte item(s) to order Menu for alacarte items will be printed and user will be asked to input which item and quantity of item they want to add.
    void
    Order.addItems​(Menu m)
    Asks user to add items to their order User will be asked to add alacarte items or promotion.
    void
    Order.addPromoItems​(Menu m)
    Asks user to add new promotion(s) to order Menu for promotions will be printed and user will be asked to input which promotion and quantity of promotion they want to add.
    void
    Order.createOrder​(Menu menu)
    Creates a new instance of order User will be asked to input table number and discount if any.
    void
    SystemManager.getOrderToUpdate​(int tableIndex, Menu menu)
    Finds a specific Order Object to be updated via Table Number
    void
    Order.updateOrder​(Menu menu)
    Asks user to update thier current Prints out the full menu and user will be asked to add or remove items Calls either addItems() or addItems().
